verbs.description: [ARG0: North Korea] [V: said] [ARG1: Kim Jong Un and President Donald Trump will discuss " denuclearization " and " durable peace " on the Korean peninsula during their upcoming summit . Kim and President Trump arrived in Singapore on Sunday ahead of Tuesday 's historic summit] .

North Korea said Kim Jong Un and President Donald Trump [V: will] discuss " denuclearization " and " durable peace " on the Korean peninsula during their upcoming summit . Kim and President Trump arrived in Singapore on Sunday ahead of Tuesday 's historic summit .

North Korea said [ARG0: Kim Jong Un and President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: discuss] [ARG1: " denuclearization " and " durable peace "] [ARGM-LOC: on the Korean peninsula] [ARGM-TMP: during their upcoming summit] . Kim and President Trump arrived in Singapore on Sunday ahead of Tuesday 's historic summit .

North Korea said Kim Jong Un and President Donald Trump will discuss " denuclearization " and " durable peace " on the Korean peninsula during their upcoming summit . [ARG1: Kim and President Trump] [V: arrived] [ARG4: in Singapore] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday] [ARGM-TMP: ahead of Tuesday 's historic summit] .
